preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 50 g of bismuth using a digital scale. 
 2. Measure 20 g of erbium. 
 3. Measure 35 g of tin. 
 4. Measure 15 g of yttrium. 
 5. Combine all measured materials in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a spatula to mix the powders thoroughly until homogenous.
